headline: Ecolab Schedules Webcast of Industry Conference for March 13, 2025
summary: ST. PAUL, Minn., March 11, 2025--Christophe Beck, Chairman of the Board & CEO Ecolab Inc., will address financial analysts at the J.P. Morgan 2025 Industrials Conference on Thursday March 13, 2025. Ecolab will offer a webcast of Mr. Beck’s presentation. Details for the webcast are as follows:

headline: Ecolab Named One of the World’s Most Ethical Companies for 19th Consecutive Year
summary: ST. PAUL, Minn., March 11, 2025--Ecolab Inc., a global sustainability leader offering water, hygiene and infection prevention solutions and services that protect people and the resources vital to life, today announced it has been named one of the 2025 World’s Most Ethical Companies® by Ethisphere, a global leader in defining and advancing the standards of ethical business practices. Ecolab has earned the recognition for 19 consecutive years since Ethisphere’s inaugural award in 2007.
